headline: Carrier Global Corporation Appoints Amy Miles to its Board of Directors
summary: PALM BEACH GARDENS, Fla., Jan. 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Carrier Global Corporation , global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, today announced the election of Amy Miles, former Chair...
